about_the_game:
Unwind to the sound of twelve lo-fi tracks by popular artist edelwize, composed to capture the innocence, charm and wonder of Alex's childhood.

This is the official soundtrack to Sweet Dreams Alex, a wholesome puzzle and construction game.
detailed_description:
Unwind to the sound of twelve lo-fi tracks by popular artist edelwize, composed to capture the innocence, charm and wonder of Alex's childhood.

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1.5 GB available space
